item.title: OpenAI says 18 to 24-year-olds account for nearly 50% of ChatGPT usage in India
item.description: The company said on Friday that users between 18 and 24 years of age account for nearly 50% of all messages sent by Indians to ChatGPT, and users under 30 accounted for 80% of usage in the country.
